Package Data

Interface Joueur

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, Moveable

    public interface Joueur
extends Moveable
    This interface describe a player. He as points, levels and a health bar.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getLevel​()
      Get the current player level
      int getPoint​()
      Get the player's score
      void heal​()
      Fully restore the player's pv
      void hurt​()
      Remove a pv from the player
      void kill​()
      Remove all the player's pv, resulting in his death
      void levelUp​()
      Bring the player to the next level
      void pointUp​()
      Add a point to the player's score

      • Methods inherited from interface Data.Entity

        getColor, getX, getY

      • Methods inherited from interface Data.Moveable

        getSpeed, moveAgain, moveDown, moveLeft, moveRight, moveUp, setSpeed
